attributes.action: Make intentionally revealing movie and TV series spoilers a criminal offence.
attributes.background: Films & TV are a staple of the average person’s enterainment. It is the storyteller’s prerogative as to when significant plot points are revealed to the audience. Intellectual property theft constitutes a criminal offence. But, just as intellectual property can be stolen, it can also be vandalised.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you're concerned about people revealing the content of a TV programme or film before it has been officially shown or released.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
